description: Try our easy to follow Low-Fat Vegetarian Pad Thai recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pad thai,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Tofu,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Low-Fat Vegetarian Pad Thai Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place noodles into a large heatproof bowl. Pour over enough boiling water to cover. Set aside for 10 minutes to soften. Stir with a fork to separate. Drain.
Heat 1 tsp of oil in a wok over a high heat. Add half the tofu and stir-fry for 2 minutes or until golden. Transfer to a plate lined with a paper towel. Reheat wok and repeat with the remaining tofu.

Heat the remaining oil in the same wok over medium heat until itâ€™s just smoking. Add onion and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Add the garlic and stir-fry for 1 minute. Add the bok choy and capsicum, and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Drizzle 2 tbs water over the vegetables. Cover wok and cook vegetables for a further 2 minutes or until they are just tender.
Meanwhile deseed and finely chop 1 chilli. Mix the egg with the soy sauce, juice of 1 lime and chilli in a jug. Thinly slice the remaining chilli and set aside for the garnish.
Add the noodles and egg mixture to the wok. Toss mixture until well combined. Return tofu to the wok and toss to combine.
Divide the Pad Thai among serving bowls. Top each bowl with coriander leaves and serve with lime wedges.
